title: Avaner Nurse Fob Watch Rhinestone Gold Pin-on Brooch Watch Hanging Stainless Steel Lapel Watch for Women
features: ✽【RHINESTONE PATTERN】: Rhinestone flower and animal pattern laple (11 different style patterns available) with simple design gold tone dial, this cute nurse watch will be a unique conversational piece and brighten up your day with your patients in the hospital.

✽【PRECISE TIME KEEPING】 : High quality quartz movement providing precise and accurate time keeping. Long lifetime with low power consumption allows you read the markers anytime without worrying about that it will stop unexpectedly.(With an extra battery)
✽【CLIP ON FOB WATCHES】This pin-on designed fob watch will be easily pinned ed on your uniform or other clothes. And it is stable enough to prevent fall off while your are working.
✽【EASY TO USE】: The little watch is simple enough to set the time, cleaning and change battery or cover. It's absolutely a great choice for nurses, doctors or any other medical professionals.
✽【STAINLESS STEEL WATCH】The durable stainless steel cover case brings your hand comfortable feel. It's absolutely a great choice for nurses, doctors or any other medical professionals.
description: Note: The watch is only resistant to daily splashes of water, please do not wear it when diving, swimming, snorkelling, water work or fishing.
